name: zenMC
short_description: After years of configuring and using XBMC, Media Portal and Media Browser I've decided to roll my own solution and share it with those that, like me, prefer to spend their time enjoying their media instead of tweaking their media center software. The inspiration for zenMC interface comes from the PS3 dashboard interface and the other media center application mention above. zenMC is written in C++ and use the Allegro 5 libraries. zenConfig, the configuration helper application is written in VB.net
summary: Simple to setup and use Media Center.
